message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thanks for showing me the product. While I like it, $150 seems a bit steep. Would you consider $100?
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $130.
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice. However, $130 is still a bit more than I had in mind. How about $110?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise again. I can offer you a price of $125. This is my final concession, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
